http://www.concordia.ca/artsci/chemistry: Organic & Physical Organic Chemistry; Primarily the mechanisms of organic reactions, the origins of catalysis and transition state stabilization by catalysts.
From 1970-2003, I taught a variety of courses in the areas of Organic, Physical and Physical Organic Chemistry.
